alert.note: Alert for Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 10:20AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Nickajack Creek at US 278 near Mableton affecting Cobb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Nickajack Creek at US 278 near Mableton. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands and the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Veterans Memorial Highway. Portions of Nickajack Park will begin to flood around one mile upstream from the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 10 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
